effect.short: Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP.
effect.full: If the target is an opponent, inflicts regular damage.  If the target is an ally, heals the target for 50% of its max HP.

flavorTexts.text:
The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that
explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a
pollen puff that restores its HP instead.
